BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token. Get from https://t.me/botfather, recommended for persistent storage. (Optional if fill BOT_SESSION)

BOT_SESSION.description: Your Bot session. generate using string_session.py, recommended for ephemeral storage. (Optional if fill BOT_TOKEN)

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Google CLIENT_SECRET. Refer project docs.

LOG_CHAT.description: Log chat id, for global restriction logs.

LOG_STICKER.description: Log chat id, for kang sticker.

USE_OCR.description: Whether to use ocr on blacklist or not.
